contents.text: Welcome to Galvanize, the learning community for technology in San Francisco.
To inquire about admissions and program details, press 1.
To learn about our software engineering and data science courses, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our program admissions team.

navigationGoals: Learn start dates and duration of the software engineering and data science programs
I’d like to learn about the software engineering bootcamp schedule, prerequisites, and enrollment process for veterans.
I’d like an overview of admissions requirements and the software engineering program curriculum.
I want to ask about part-time evening options for your software engineering course.
Ask about admission requirements and curriculum structure for the data science bootcamp

contents.text: For information on tuition, payment plans, and scholarships, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our financial services department.

navigationGoals: Find out available scholarship options and payment plan deadlines
I need information on tuition costs, payment plans, scholarships, and GI Bill benefits.
I need detailed tuition breakdown, payment plan options, and scholarship criteria.
I want information on senior tuition discounts and payment plan options.
Inquire about tuition costs, payment plans, and scholarship opportunities for the software engineering program

contents.text: For current student services and support, press 2.
If you need assistance with your student account or classroom resources, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to our student support team.

navigationGoals: Resolve access issue with my student account to retrieve course materials
I’m having trouble logging into my student portal and accessing my course materials.
I need to reset my student portal credentials and retrieve my classroom resources.
I need help accessing my student account to view my course materials.
Get assistance accessing my student portal and downloading course materials

contents.text: For technical help with our learning platform, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Fix playback errors on the online learning platform so I can resume my lessons
I need technical support for the online learning platform, such as troubleshooting video and code editor issues.
I’m getting SSH authentication failures in the cloud lab VM and need technical assistance.
I’m having trouble logging into the online learning platform.
Troubleshoot technical issues with the online learning platform environment
